Table 2. State-of-the-art comparison on the KITTI test set for the car category in terms of the metric of AP40. Extra data denotes the 
methods with extra data or external networks used in the training or inference or not. '-' denotes the methods have not been published 
yet without specific details. The bold black/blue color indicates the best/the second best performing method under the same 'No' setting. 
'Improvement' denotes the increasing in performance compared to methods without extra data. Our approach achieves the best performance 
compared with the state-of-the-arts under both settings on moderate.
